item.title: Dumping bags of food every weekend, 13th September
item.description:
It's 05 Pincombe House Orb Street Se171ah They are using the premises as a cafe maybe 100 people or more they sell alcohol people are being sick outside urinating I've reported it before they are using just eat now this is a business for sure I live in the block and see everything you have supplied a waist food bin and I've told them but same old story don't understand English the flat looks dirty from the outside they have a large dog they use the garden as a dining area have large barbecue area why don't you send someone round on a Saturday

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Orb Street, Walworth, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Damaged no plates vehicle, 13th September
item.description:

item.title: Broken bins, rubbish spread into street, 13th September
item.description:
I am not resident here, but 8-13 Poolman Street apartment block and the apartment block opposite side of the road on the Poolmans Street/Marlow Way junction have several. wheelie bins with no lids or broken lids. As a result, foxes and wind are spreading domestic waste into the street every week massively increasing levels of litter.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Marlow Way, Rotherhithe, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Food waste and plastics in street, 13th September
item.description:
Bins are constantly overflowing and open and then the rubbish is taken and spread into the street by foxes and other pets who pull the bags open (or the rubbish is blown by the wind). It is creating a risk of rats.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 5-6, Chargrove Close, Rotherhithe, London

item.title: Communal waste and litter on Mandela way road and pavement, 12th September
item.description:

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Mandela Way, Old Kent Road, London
